name: saving the animals
description:
content warning:
suicide joke; flashing lights

you're noah, and you'll get your animals at any cost. this is a weird & short 3d platformer partly inspired by arcane kids' beautiful Bubsy reboot.

sound is pretty important, maybe use headphones.

browser version fucks up the audio, visuals and performance just a little bit. download it instead!

Cool text from https://cooltext.com
Some sound effects from https://freesound.org and from WarioWare D.I.Y.

Original music:
https://sammortimer.bandcamp.com/album/saving-the-animals

The rest:
Spaniard by The J. Arthur Keenes Band
Self-Esteem Fund by Kelly Bailey
Polaroid by Laugh & Peace
Aminals by Baths
Bashful Billy by Myrna Lorrie
